genericContent.itemName: Sceptre 40 Class 1080p LCD HDTV with pair of Wireless Headphones
genericContent.shortDescription:
This bundle includes:
  • Sceptre 40 class 1080p LCD HDTV
  • Wireless Headphones
genericContent.longDescription:
Sceptre 40 Class (39" viewable) LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV, X409BV-FHD:
  • 39" LCD panel
    • With a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution
  • True 16:9 aspect ratio

    • View your movies as the director intended
  • Built-in digital tuner

    • Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available
  • 8 ms response time

    • Quick response time for a great picture
  • 90,000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio
  • HDMI Inputs: 3

    • Enjoy a superior HD experience with HDMI one cable solution
  • 39" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner
  • Wall mountable
  • USB port

    • Allows you to play your music and view photos


    Sly Electronics Wireless Earphone, SLH180W:

    • Wireless reception from any electrical device with audio outputs
    • Enjoy TV programming through the wireless headphone without disturbing others
    • Listen to FM radio through the earphones
    • Effective Range: Over 25'
    • Reception through walls and other obstacles
    • Bass speaker to simulate surround sound
    • Used in conjunction with SLH200W transmitter (sold separately)
genericContent.shelfDescription: This bundle includes: <li>Sceptre 40 class 1080p LCD HDTV<li> Wireless Headphones
